long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Store links, copied text, personal notes or anything else on a simple browser extension…

Have you ever had the issue of hoping to copy and paste more than a single link or piece of text, having a thought on the go and not having a place to store it or wanting a place to put your bibliography and source links while doing research? Well, we did too! Thus, we decided to make amplior- a simple copy and paste tool where you can store all your links, references, notes or pieces of text you will ever need, having the piece of mind that they will save locally onto your browser without any risk of losing them (even during internet outage or power loss!).

Through this extension, one can increase online productivity, work rate and efficiency while completing tasks both better and faster. Through the simple UI of the extension, with easy functionality, one can peruse the web making notes, copying text and forming ideas at the click of a button. Due to the apps incredible ease of use and integration within Chrome, one can effortlessly add a keyboard auto-command shortcut to make this already simple extension better automated and streamlined (chrome://extensions/shortcuts). We hope you thoroughly enjoy this product and we look forward to hearing your feedback!
